name: SEER Mets MerkelCellSkin
title: SEER Mets
notes:
**Note 1**:  In-transit metastasis is coded in CS Lymph Nodes.

**Note 2**:  Nodes in contiguous (secondary) and bidirectional (cephalad/caudal) primary nodal basins are coded in CS Lymph Nodes. (Clarification V0204)
